2006-10-05

Album of the year contenders 4, 5, 6 and 7

I've been so slack lately so here's a bunch of contenders for my consideration at the end of the year...

#4 Nina Nastasia - On Leaving

Buy On Leaving from Amazon.com
Another superb album - that makes four in a row.

#5 Yo La Tengo - I Am Not Afraid of You...

Buy I Am Not Afraid of You... from Amazon.com
An album that pretty much squeezes the Yo La Tengo experience into a single package - a balance between the quiet and the angry, the twee and the heavy, the smart and the silly...

#6 Fiel Garvie - Caught Laughing

Buy Caught Laughing from Amazon.com

#7 Sparklehorse - Dreamt for Light Years in the Belly of a Mountain

Buy Dreamt for Light Years in the Belly of a Mountain from Amazon.com
More of the very lovely same from Sparklehorse.
